summary: Three young hobby archeologists witness a satanic ritual in a secluded villa. Instead of helping poor female victims they decide to secretly document the events.
cast: Tony Matera|Mirella Rossi|Iolanda Mascitti|Matilde Antonelli|Giovanni Pezzoli|Gianni Pesola|Zaira Zoccheddu|Cesare Nizzica|Nicola Morelli|Salvatore Carrara|Elsio Mancuso|Katia Cardinali
title: Casa dell'amore... la polizia interviene
